peril.model.board

Class ModelContinent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.board.ModelContinent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, Continent

    public final class ModelContinent
extends java.util.Observable
implements Continent, java.util.Observer
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a continent on the ModelBoard which consists of a Set of ModelCountrys.
    Since:
    2018-03-16
    Version:
    1.01.02
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    ModelCountry, Observable, Observer, Continent

      Holds the ModelCountry that comprise this ModelContinent.

      The ModelHazard that will effect the ModelCountry at the end of each round.
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the ModelContinent.
      private ModelPlayer ruler
      The current ModelPlayer that rules all ModelCountrys in this ModelContinent.

    • Field Detail

      • hazard

        public final ModelHazard hazard
        The ModelHazard that will effect the ModelCountry at the end of each round.

      • countries

        private final java.util.Set<ModelCountry> countries
        Holds the ModelCountry that comprise this ModelContinent.

      • name

        private final java.lang.String name
        The name of the ModelContinent.

      • ruler

        private ModelPlayer ruler
        The current ModelPlayer that rules all ModelCountrys in this ModelContinent. If all the ModelCountrys in this ModelContinent are NOT ruled by the same Player then this is null. This is determined in isRuled().
